spec_data.Name: xerces-c27-devel
spec_data.Description:
This package contains the header files, static libraries and development
documentation for xerces-c 2.7.0. If you like to develop programs using
xerces-c 2.7.0, you will need to install xerces-c27-devel.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 12:50:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Header files, libraries and development documentation for xerces-c27
